description:
Total care for every corner of your landscape

Keep your whole landscape thriving with five powerful plant food formulas that work together to feed trees, shrubs, gardens, and soil.

Our complete kit combines specialized tree and shrub food, fast-acting plant nutrition, and soil amendment in one easy-to-use kit. Perfect for mixed landscapes, you'll get targeted fertilizer for every plant and custom-engineered sprayers for easy application.

Sunday garden solutions are created without pesticides or harsh chemicals—so you can enjoy your garden and get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.kit_benefits:
Complete nutrition for your whole yard
Specialized care for trees and shrubs
Fast-acting all-purpose liquid plant food
Enhances soil health naturally
Ideal for all regions and gardens
Easy-to-use application systems
Safe for use on edible plants
sections.whats_included:
2 All-Purpose Organic Garden Fertilizer (7-3-7 NPK): Multipurpose organic dry garden nutrients for every outdoor garden plant.
1 WonderFert Tree & Shrub (6-3-4 NPK): Specialized liquid woody plant formula.
1 WonderFert All-Purpose (10-2-6 NPK): Fast-acting liquid all-purpose plant food.
1 Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Soil amendment for healthier roots and soil.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply to actively growing plants in the morning or evening.
Start with dry fertilizer: Apply All-Purpose dry garden fertilizer at planting time. Work into the soil around plants and water thoroughly. Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
Apply Soil Booster between feedings or in place of normal watering.
Finally, apply liquid fertilizer: Use WonderFert Tree & Shrub on woody plants and All-Purpose dry nutrients for all other areas. Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What's the best way to use this complete kit?
Use All-Purpose Food for general areas, Tree & Shrub formula specifically for woody plants, and Soil Booster regularly throughout the landscape for overall soil health.
How often should I apply each product?
Apply all-purpose dry fertilizer every 4-6 weeks, WonderFert Tree & Shrub formula provides up to 8 weeks of feeding, and Soil Booster can be used weekly between fertilizer applications.
Which plants get which products?
Use WonderFert Tree & Shrub formula for woody plants like trees and shrubs, All-Purpose products for gardens and other landscape areas, and Soil Booster anywhere you want to improve soil health.
How large an area does this cover?
The kit covers up to 500 sq. ft., perfect for mixed landscapes with trees, shrubs, and garden areas.
When will I see results?
Liquid WonderFert products show quick results within days, while dry fertilizer provides sustained feeding over several weeks.
How to Apply Sunday Garden Fertilizers & Soil Nutrients
Discover the simplicity of nurturing your garden with Sunday’s range of garden fertilizers and soil amendments. Our step-by-step guide makes growing healthy and vibrant plants easy and effective.
